001package com.randomnoun.common;
002
003/* (c) 2013 randomnoun. All Rights Reserved. This work is licensed under a

006
007import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
008import java.io.IOException;
009import java.io.InputStream;
010import java.io.OutputStream;
011import java.io.File;
012
013import java.lang.Process;
014
015/** Utility class for running processes, including timeouts, and slightly better exceptions that include more information
016 * about process failure. 
017 * 
018 */
019public class ProcessUtil {
020    
021        /// maximum output; if >0, removes passwords & limits to this amount
022        private int maxOutputChars = 8000;
023        
024        public static int NO_MAX_OUTPUT_CHARS = 0;
025        
026        public void setMaxOutputChars(int maxOutputChars) {
027                this.maxOutputChars = maxOutputChars;
028        }
029        
030        /** Encapsulates an error from executing a command through System.exec()
031         * 
032         */
033        public class ProcessException extends Exception {
034                
035                /** Generated serialVersionUID */
036                private static final long serialVersionUID = -6301630237335589674L;
037                
038                private String command;
039                private int exitCode;
040                private String stdout;
041                private String stderr;
042                private String exitCause;
043
044                /** Create a new executable exception
045                 * 
046                 * @param command Command being executed
047                 * @param hostname The host the command was being executed on
048                 * @param exitCode The exit code of the program
049                 * @param stdout The standard output of the program
050                 * @param stderr The error output of the program
051                 */
052                public ProcessException(String command, String exitCause, int exitCode, String stdout, String stderr) {
053                        super("Error executing '" + command + "'" + ", cause='" + exitCause + "'");
054                        
055                        this.command = command;
056                        this.exitCode = exitCode;
057                        this.exitCause = exitCause;
058                        this.stdout = stdout;
059                        this.stderr = stderr;
060                }
061                public String getStdout() { return stdout; }
062                public String getStderr() { return stderr; }
063                public String getCommand() { return command; }
064                public int getExitCode() { return exitCode; }
065                public String getExitCause() { return exitCause; }
066                public String getMessage() {
067                        // trim stdout/stderr
068                        if (maxOutputChars>0) { stdout = Text.getDisplayString("stdout", stdout, 8000); }
069                        if (maxOutputChars>0) { stderr = Text.getDisplayString("stderr", stderr, 8000); }
070                        return super.getMessage() +
071                          "; " + 
072                          (stdout==null ? "" : ", stdout='" + stdout + "'\n") +
073                      (stderr==null ? "" : ", stderr='" + stderr + "'\n") +
074                      "exitCode=" + exitCode;
075                }
076        }
077        
078        
079
080        public String exec(String[] command) throws ProcessException {
081                return exec(Text.join(command, " "), -1, null, null, null);
082        }
083        
084        public String exec(String[] command, String[] env) throws ProcessException {
085                return exec(Text.join(command, " "), -1, null, env, null);
086        }
087
088        @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
089        public String exec(String command, long timeout, InputStream stdin, String[] env, File dir) throws ProcessException {
090                Process process;
091                try {
092                        process = Runtime.getRuntime().exec(command, env, dir);
093                } catch (IOException ioe) {
094                        throw (ProcessException) new ProcessException(command, "IOException", 0, "", "").initCause(ioe);
095                }
096                InputStream stdout = process.getInputStream();
097                InputStream stderr = process.getErrorStream();
098                OutputStream processStdin = process.getOutputStream();
099                ByteArrayOutputStream stdoutByteArrayStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
100                ByteArrayOutputStream stderrByteArrayStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
101                
102                // could probably use nio these days to remove the .stop()s below
103                Thread copyStdoutThread = StreamUtil.copyThread(stdout, stdoutByteArrayStream, 1024);
104                Thread copyStderrThread = StreamUtil.copyThread(stderr, stderrByteArrayStream, 1024);
105                Thread copyStdinThread = null;
106                if (stdin!=null) { 
107                        copyStdinThread = StreamUtil.copyAndCloseThread(stdin, processStdin, 1024);
108                        copyStdinThread.start();
109                }
110                
111                copyStdoutThread.start();
112                copyStderrThread.start();
113                int exitCode = -1;
114                boolean throwException = false;
115                long interval = 100;
116                String cause = "";
117                
118                try {
119                        // this didn't work for some reason, but maybe it does now
120                        // exitCode = process.waitFor();
121                        
122                        long    timeWaiting = 0;
123                        boolean processFinished = false;
124                        
125                        while ((timeout == -1 || timeWaiting < timeout) && !processFinished) {
126                                processFinished = true;
127                                Thread.sleep(interval);  // caught below
128                                
129                                try {
130                                        exitCode = process.exitValue();
131                                } catch (IllegalThreadStateException e) {
132                                        // process hasn't finished yet
133                                        processFinished = false;
134                                }
135                                timeWaiting += interval;
136                        }
137                        
138                        if (processFinished) {
139                                // wait for  copy threads to complete
140                                copyStdoutThread.join();
141                                copyStderrThread.join();  
142                                if (copyStdinThread!=null) {
143                                        copyStdinThread.stop();   // can't do much about stdin
144                                }
145                                if (exitCode != 0) {
146                                        cause = "non-0 exitCode";
147                                        throwException = true;
148                                }
149                        } else {
150                                cause = "timeout";
151                                throwException = true;
152                                process.destroy(); 
153                                if (copyStdinThread!=null) {
154                                        copyStdinThread.stop();
155                                }
156                                copyStderrThread.stop(); // .join() here hangs. should probably set a flag here instead
157                                copyStdoutThread.stop(); // maybe stop these ?
158                        }                       
159                        
160                } catch (InterruptedException ie) {
161                        // should probably clean things up here.
162                        cause = "InterruptedException";
163                        throwException = true;
164                        process.destroy();
165                        if (copyStdinThread!=null) {
166                                copyStdinThread.stop();
167                        }
168                        copyStderrThread.stop();
169                        copyStdoutThread.stop(); // maybe allow these to continue to completion ?                       
170                }
171                
172                if (throwException) {
173                        throw new ProcessException(
174                                command, cause, exitCode,  
175                                stdoutByteArrayStream.toString(), stderrByteArrayStream.toString());
176                }
177                return stdoutByteArrayStream.toString();
178        }       
179        
180        
181        
182        
183}
